edu.umn.se.trap.db
Class GrantDBWrapper

java.lang.Object
  edu.umn.se.trap.db.GrantDBWrapper

public class GrantDBWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

A wrapper around a source of grant information. This provides information on grant organization types, funding organizations, account types, approvers, and available funds.

Author:
andrewh

public static java.lang.Double getGrantBalance(java.lang.String accountName)
                                        throws edu.umn.se.trap.db.KeyNotFoundException

Parameters:
accountName - - The grant account to get the balance for.
Returns:
- The balance for the account
Throws:
KeyNotFoundException - - When the grant cannot be found in the db

getDODGrants

public static java.util.List<Grant> getDODGrants(java.util.List<Grant> grants)
                                          throws edu.umn.se.trap.db.KeyNotFoundException
Filter the given list of grants to just NIH grants.

Parameters:
grants - - the unfiltered list of grants
Returns:
- The list of NIH grants from the original grants parameter
Throws:
KeyNotFoundException - When a grant cannot be found in the db

getGrantsOfCertainType

public static java.util.List<Grant> getGrantsOfCertainType(java.util.List<Grant> grants,
                                                           java.lang.String acctType,
                                                           java.lang.String fundingOrg)
                                                    throws edu.umn.se.trap.db.KeyNotFoundException
Filter the given list of grants to just those that have a certain account type (ie sponsored or non-sponsored) and funding organization (DOD or NIH).

Parameters:
grants - - The unfiltered list of grants
acctType - - The type of the account to filter on.
fundingOrg - - The funding organization to filter on.
Returns:
- A list of grants filtered to those with the appropriate account type and funding organization.
Throws:
KeyNotFoundException - When a grant cannot be found in the db

getForeignGrants

public static java.util.List<Grant> getForeignGrants(java.util.List<Grant> grants)
                                              throws edu.umn.se.trap.db.KeyNotFoundException
Filter the list of grants to just the foreign grants.

Parameters:
grants - - The full list of grants to be filtered.
Returns:
- The list of foreign grants from the original list.
Throws:
KeyNotFoundException - If the grant cannot be found in the db

setGrantDB

public static void setGrantDB(edu.umn.se.trap.db.GrantDB db)
Set the underlying db that is to be called by this wrapper

Parameters:
db - - The db implementation for the wrapper to call.

isValidGrant

public static boolean isValidGrant(java.lang.String accountName)
Check if a grant is present in the database.

Parameters:
accountName - - The account name to check for presence in the db
Returns:
- True if the grant account is present in the db, false otherwise.
